"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Audere buffs mining speed, as durability decreases."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.audere_shamir.1"}]}]

sections.name: page_1
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"The Audere Shamir is found on Barium Bands. It can be placed onto tools.\n\nHigher levels of Haste are awarded for lower durability. The maximum level of Haste is IV, granted when the tool is at less than 3.66% durability."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.audere_shamir.2"}]}]
